name: Tribal Sweater Infinity
description: Snuggle up with your bohemian side in our pale pink infinity scarf made from the cowl of a sweater and featuring tribal print trim, a handmade yellow flower fashioned from a t-shirt and a turquoise blue bead.

name: Vintage Collar Choker
description: Circle your neck in style with a choker fashioned from a vintage blouse and featuring a handmade orange t-shirt flower with a silver sequin. One-of-a-kind accessories – they’re definitely our thing. Make this one yours! Comfortably fits a size small and measures 16 inches.

name: Boho Sweater Skirt
description: Things have gone a bit topsy-turvy at Boho Monroe and we love it! This adorable heavy-weight acrylic sweater was once a top dweller – seeing the world propped on the shoulders of a hip chick. New life for this sweet patterned knit means a different perspective -- hugging the hips as a fun skirt. Waist band features elastic for a comfy fit. Fits size small to medium and measures 16 inches in length.

name: Stars & Stripes Sweater
description: Feeling patriotic? Our light weight baby blue sweater has been embellished with fun little red, white and blue stars, a large star on the back featuring a heart with a button, and a flannel pocket in cranberry, brown and blue on the front. Fits size large to x-large and measures 26 inches in length and 27 ¼ inches arm length. Hand washing recommended.

name: Brown Trim Sweater Vest
description: A pop of yellow will make you and everyone around you smile! Our sweater vest features fun patches in brown knit fabric, a hand made three dimensional flower fashioned from adobe colored mesh material and a unique red button. Fits size large and x-large and measures 23 inches in length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Free Spirit Button Down
description: Set your bohemian spirit free with our unique floral button down. Fabric featuring an overabundance of whimsical buds is taken to the next level with the addition of green floral knit added to the lower sleeves, a pop of yellow trim, a bright pink doily hanging just off the front edge, a pink and green wooden “Hope” button, and a multi-colored floral patch with fun buttons on the back. Fits size large and measures 24 ½ inches in length with sleeves measuring 34 ¼ inches in length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Botanical Garden Sweater
description: A light weight, dark purple sweater is transformed into a go-everywhere garden. The original lace top layer now features a white shimmery gold whimsical pattern, dark purple stitched floral patches, unique green stitched leaves and forest green cuffs. Layer it up and pair it with leggings and your favorite boots to brighten up the cold winter days, or break it out in spring to get the season started. Fits size large to XL and measures 24 ½ inches in length/28 inches arm length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Butterfly Cardigan
description: A light-weight textured mustard cardigan has been transformed into walking-go-anywhere art and a sure fire conversation starter. A large glittery butterfly patch added to the back, two braided t-shirt strings added to the front, and baby blue cloth buttons on each sleeve take a fine sweater to the next level in fashion. Fits size small to medium and measures 16 inches in length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Chic Sweater Vest
description: Our chic Monroe-inspired vest is just waiting to be paired with your favorite tank or layered up with a button-down or turtle neck. We’ve replaced the original buttons with a fun new collection, added a pop of color with an ocean blue pocket, and treated the back to a variety of silver and gold studded patches. Fits sizes XS to small and measures 18 inches in length.

name: Fair Isle Hippie Sweater
description: Be bold and make a style statement this season! Our zip-up, short-sleeved sweater is embellished to the next level and features a pop of orange jersey fabric on the sleeves, a large floral printed peace sign on the back and a sweet reminder “love” patch on the lower front. Wear it out when the weather is warm or layer it up for cooler days. Fits medium to large sizes and measures 25 inches in length.

name: Chic Boho Leg Warmers
description: You’ll be feeling Boho luxe in these ultra-soft leg warmers. We’ve paired unique floral patches outlined in blue beading with brown thermal material tied in bows and topped it all off with green and blue floral ruffle material to take a simple knit to another level entirely. Perfect to pair over the top of your favorite ankle boots for a feature role, or as a supporting actress winner peeking out the top of a pair of knee high boots. Fits size small to medium and measures 17 ¾ inches in length.

name: Lace Boot Cover Leg Warmers
description: Dress up your favorite ankle boots in frilly style with our one-of-a-kind leg warmers. Victorian-inspired lace paired with whimsical buttons in brown and cream are the perfect adornment to the deep purple knit warmers (repurposed from the sleeves of a lovely purple sweater begging for a second life!) A perfect fit for everyone, these warmers measure 16 7/8 inches in length.

name: Colorful Floral Pillow
description: Give your home décor a little flair,  Boho Monroe style, with our adorable and colorful floral pillow. A little lace and sparkle from Monroe paired with strips of bright color and an orange flower from Boho, will turn any piece of furniture in your home into your new favorite snuggle spot.

name: Boho Print Skirt
description: There’s no doubt about it – this skirt is an attention getter.  Featuring bright pops of rich color, this vintage find is made from velveteen and is the perfect length to show off your boots. Not for those who wish to be wall flowers, our get-you-noticed skirt fit size M/L and measures 37 inches in length.

name: Striped Poncho
description: Let’s jump into a time machine and head back to the 60’s or 70’s with our vintage knit poncho. The perfect cover up for the cold days ahead, it features fringe all around and buttons down the front. Snuggle up this fall and winter in style – poncho is one size fits all and measures roughly 26 inches in length.

name: Ribbon Top
description: Our vintage fashion top features beautifully colored ribbon laced throughout and neatly tied on the bottom. Muted colors make this short-sleeved top perfect for pairing with jeans, funky skirts or wearing over a fun dress. It’s made of acrylic, fits size medium and measures 21” in length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Autumn Day Dress
description: Let’s go vintage, gals! Our Boho inspired hippie dress is sweet, sophisticated and ready to go home with you for the fall season. Made from comfortable linen fabric, it’s warm color palette and lovely unique flowers will pair perfectly with knitted tights, a comfy sweater, knee high boots and fun accessories. Fits size small to medium and measures 40 inches.

name: Lounge Sweater
description: Comfort is key -- but fashion is king! Why not have both? Our green lounge sweater, featuring a rose/wine colored striped belt along the bottom, coral printed wrist trim and floral embroidery on the back, is the perfect answer to fashionable comfort. Fits size S/M with an arm length of 30 inches and a torso length of 22 ½ inches.

name: Satin Trimmed Tee
description: A tee shirt doesn’t have to be plain or boring. Here’s proof! Our berry colored short sleeve tee is given a second chance with a Victorian inspired piece of fabric and brown satin ribbon tie added along the bottom. Fits size S/M with a torso length measuring 26 ½ inches.

name: Floral Infinity Scarf
description: Our floral infinity scarf was once a dress. Now completely repurposed, this vibrant scarf is ready to be paired up with your favorite sweater and get noticed.

name: Tribal Infinity Scarf
description: A neutral fabric, colorful buttons and a tribal print all mix together to make the perfect accessory recipe. This Boho inspired infinity scarf will take your outfit to the next level.

name: Fringe Infinity Scarf
description: A pop of purple will give your fall outfit a serious edge. Find it here, in our infinity scarf made from a purple tee shirt carefully paired with colorful buttons, purple lace fabric and white fringe.

name: Twisted Scarf
description: Pair our striped twisted scarf with your favorite fall outfit for that trendsetting look. A simple baby blue fabric with green and brown stripes evolves into something new when paired with white and green twisted ribbon and finished off with dark blue embroidered trim. It’s the perfect addition to your new fall wardrobe!

name: Flower Power Capris
description: Sometimes opposites do attract and compliment each other. This is definitely the case with our denim capris – featuring a strong tribal pattern and delicate flowers for that free spirited Boho feel. Don’t worry, we didn’t forget our Monroe side – we’ve added a colorful cluster of buttons just for fun on the right leg. Denim capris are perfect for fall – pair them with tights and boots for a trendy layered look.  Fits size 2 with a leg measurement of 31 ¾ inches.

name: Chocolate Jacket
description: Chocolate, in any form, is hard to resist. Our chocolate colored linen jacket features vintage fabric panels, with a circus-esque flair, that flatter your figure. Topped off with matching fabric buttons on the collar, you won’t find a blazer quite like this anywhere else. Fits size medium with an arm length of 22 inches and a torso length of 24 inches.

name: Chic Jacket
description: Did you promise yourself you were going to add some chic fun to your work wardrobe this fall? We’ve got you covered with our completely office appropriate (yet fun) button down jacket featuring Victorian inspired trim and a bundle of floral patches.  Why not be the best looking employee in the office? Jacket fits size XL with a torso length of 24 inches and an arm length of 23 ½ inches.

name: Boho Garden Tank [001SH10]
description: There’s nothing like an adorable tank top to show off your summer glow. We've taken a fun tie-dyed tank and added a garden of patches, including a flower, a butterfly and even a lady bug peeking out of a handmade pocket. Tank top is a size small/medium and measures 24.5 inches in length.

name: Vested Tank [001SH11]
description: A plain fashion tank top in bright orange is given some serious character with a rust floral vest added to the front and fun patches set into a unique pattern on the back. What a way to amp up your fun and funky style! Vested tank is available in size XS and measures 29.5 inches in length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Denim Boho Dress  [001D11]
description:
A once plain fitted denim dress is transformed into a one-of-a-kind Boho creation! Our dark denim structured dress features a low zipper back, mid-back and neck ties, bright floral sewn patches, festive neck trim, vintage buttons and crocheted pops of color. Your “going out” look will never be the same. 

Dress available in size XS/ S and measures 40 inches in length.

name: Little Black Dress [001D10]
description: We took a simple black dress to the next level with simple patches, stitched graphics and clusters of vintage buttons in cream and white. It's a simple treasure for the Monroe side of your wardrobe. Dress is a size large and measures 39 inches in length.

name: Floral Layered Sundress [001D9]
description: Prepare to be the center of attention in our Monroe inspired sundress. A bright floral skirt is re-purposed as a new top layer on an already beautiful green sundress. A colorful patterned trim pulls in the waist and ties in the back where it meets some extra flirty green trim. Dress is a size small and measures 33 inches in length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Monroe Jumper Dress [001D8]
description: Get ready to fall in love with this sweet Monroe inspired dress. A structured plaid jumper with shoulder straps features a collection of vintage buttons cascading down the front to meet up with a glittering flower. Two side pockets offer a place to stash your stuff and feature more buttons. Wear it with sandals in the summer or layer it up with a tee and tights for the fall and winter. Dress is a size small and measures 32 inch length. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Vintage Mini  [001VA1]
description:
We've decided to share some of our very favorite vintage finds with you! Our owl print mini-dress is an absolute fav. Take everything good about the 60's/70's and you get a funky owl print, white yoke front, edge-trimmed ruffles, pop buttons, puffed sleeves, tie-back waist and the perfect above-the-knee length! And... it's hand made, which means it will last another bunch of decades. Hand washing recommended. 

Size: XS/ S
Length: 32 3/8 inches

name: Corduroy Skirt  [001SK1]
description:
An ordinary brown corduroy skirt is transformed into something new and fun with the addition of vintage patterned trim around the waist, brown leather fringe pockets on the front and back, and three one-of-a-kind large buttons. Scale it down with a tank or crop top for spring and summer or layer it up with tights or leggings during the fall and winter. Hand washing is recommended.

Size: 6M
Length: 20 inches

name: Wrap Crop Top  [001SH8]
description: Release your inner flower child with our wrap-around crop top. A pretty yellow lace is featured on the bottom hem, while the neckline features a collar made from a tee and cut into a fun fringe and then pulled together with a handmade flower patch. Wrap this crop top to fit you perfectly and prepare to be complimented!

name: Crochet Tank  [001SH6]
description:
A gorgeous blue cotton tank features an incredibly vibrant design patch placed carefully on the back. A pretty crochet neckline in the front showcases a drawstring ending in colorful tassels. A great top to wear out with the girls, to run errands, or to dress up for a night out.  

Size: L/ XL
Length: 28.5 in

name: Tribal Tank  [001SH5]
description:
Vibrant tribal patches and drawstring bows turn this once simple summer tank top into a one-of-a-kind must-have! Front measures 24.5 inches and the back measures 27 inches in length.

Size: S/M

name: Bohemian Crop Top  [001SH4]
description:
A crop top made with love! The super cool factor is taken to the next level with a belt added around the bottom, a leather string threaded through the front, a heart adorning the back and small beaded patches on the top back. Turn heads all summer in this love-inspired Boho creation. Hand washing is recommended.

Size: S/M
Length: 16 1/8 inches

name: Sunshine Tee [001SH3]
description:
Brighten up your tee shirt collection with our yellow sunshine inspired top,featuring a bright blue crocheted vest on the front and back and several unique nature inspired patches. Hand washing is recommended. Hand washing is recommended. 

Size: XS
Length: 26 inches

name: Baby Blue Set  [001JS2]
description:
Our two-piece jewelry set is perfect for those who have a more sophisticated, simple style. Cream lace trim and a modern layered earring make this baby blue collar necklace and cuff a Monroe treasure you can wear anywhere. 
 
Necklace is adjustable and considered one size fits all. Necklace width measures 17 7/8 inches and length measures 3 inches. 

Cuff width measures 10 7/16 inches and length measures 2 1/8 inches. We consider this cuff a size large.

name: Gold Leaf Cuff & Collar  [001JS]
description:
Out of the ordinary is our goal and we think we've hit the nail on the head with our Gold Leaf Cuff & Collar set! A dress shirt gets new life when reconstructed with bohemian trim and gold leaf earrings. 

Collar necklace is adjustable and considered one size fits all. Necklace length measures 14 inches and width measures 2 7/8 inches. 

We consider the cuff size a medium. The length measures 9 inches and the width measures 2 inches.

name: Button Hat  [001HT4]
description: Our Monroe inspired summer hat features a bright floral scarf and a variety of vintage buttons. Block the sun in one-of-a-kind style!

name: Peacock Dress  [001D7]
description:
Taking something plain and turning it into a conversation piece is what we do! A graphic patch, featuring a peacock, white and purple vintage doilies, detailed sparkle on the skirt, petite white and purple flowers along the neckline, and a yellow fabric tie turn a basic jersey dress into show stopper. Wear it to run errands or pack it up for vacation -- it's perfect! Hand washing is recommended.

Size L/XL
Length measures 37 inches

name: Denim Jumper [001D6]
description:
When was the last time you pranced around in a denim jumper? You’re not too old to be doing that now! Jumpers are in and we've updated this one for you by adding bright green trim, yellow zig-zag stitching, floral patches and a floral skirt cut from the bottom of a dress. Hand washing is recommended.

Size Medium
Length measures 35 inches

name: Floral Maxi Dress [001D5]
description:
Never before seen, this once simple floral maxi dress has been transformed. Cut from the center bottom to slightly under the chest, this dress is perfectly paired with denim, leggings, shorts or whatever your heart desires. A cream crochet vest added to the front and a vintage doily on the back gives this dress someadded Boho Monroe flair. Hand washing is recommended.

Size Small
Length measures 49.5 inches

name: Bohemian Sundress [001D4]
description:
Beaded fringed patches and added trim along the bottom of the skirt,  make this lightweight gauzy summer dress incredibly unique. Simple, chic and very bohemian, it's super cute worn casually or dressed up with lots of accessories. Bottom line? It belongs in your closet!

Size Medium
Length measures 41.5 inches

name: Whimsical Magnets  [002M2]
description: Which of these magnets fits your style? The emotional ones? Or the unique whimsical ones? Get the set of 6 and add unique, one-of-a-kind Monroe inspired, hand painted magnets to your fridge.

name: Rosebud Dress  [001D3]
description:
This sweet and simple sundress has a Monroe flair! Made from vintage rosebud fabric, it features a fitted bodice, simple straps, an elastic back, comfy front pockets and a sweet ruffled hem line. A white lace patch is surrounded by a crown of floral and leaf patches on the front, while a bright floral head scarf makes the perfect bow in the back. You will look and feel amazing -- coming and going!

Size Medium
Length measures 33.5 inches

name: Flower Anklet  [001AN1]
description:
Your ankle needs some accessory love too! Dress it up with this sweet and simple anklet made from a women’s tie dyed button down, featuring an adorable trim and finished with an easy snap. Perfect to dress up a pair of cuffed jeans or to compliment your favorite skirt and sandals, this cuff is cute, comfortable and  full of whimsy! 
Length measures 11.5 inches and width measures 2 1/8 inches. We consider this cuff a size "small".

name: Romance Band [001B12]
description:
A beautiful blue background fabric brings a romantic feel to our band bracelet. Unique edge trim, paired with three dimensional daisy patches, and a delicate button closure complete the look. Pair this comfortable cuff with a casual pair of jeans or a flirty dress and you are definitely ready for romance!

Length measures 8 ½ inches and width measures 1 7/8 inches.

name: Daisy Bracelet [001B13]
description:
Created from a vintage blouse, our Daisy Bracelet is sweet and simple in design. A bold white zig-zag trim, a pop of green and a sprinkling of yellow daisy patches make this wrist accessory perfect for pairing with outfits in the warm summer months ahead. Wear it during the cold days of fall or winter as a whimsical reminder of the brighter days to come.
 
Length measures 8 7/8 inches and width measures 3 inches.

name: Blue Tribal Band [001B14]
description: Take a bright blue patterned fabric, add a pop of bright red tribal flair and you get the perfect accessory for any outfit. Our super comfy small wrist band measures 8 1/2 inches in length and 1 1/8 inches in width and easily adds a dash of Boho flair to your accessory collection.

name: Alter Ego Bracelet [001B15]
description:
An accessory with two distinct personalities! Double it up for an extra frilly bracelet that makes your wrist look and feel uber stylish. Stretch it out to its full potential and you have a choker that will spark conversation. Either way, this fun bracelet/choker makes its mark with stylish striped fabric, ruffled edges, delicate lace trim and a button closure.  

Length measures 15 inches and width measures 2 ½ inches.

name: Boho Jacket [001J2]
description:
A beautiful blue tailored corduroy jacket takes on a whole new life when brightly colored embroidered patches are placed in fun places. Wear it with jeans for a trendy casual look or dress it up with your favorite pencil skirt and top for a fun day at work. Just be prepared to be the topic of conversation around the water cooler. 

Women's size M/L; arm length measures 26 1/8 inches; torso length measures 24 inches. Hand washing is recommended.

name: Floral Strapless Dress [001D1]
description:
This dress is certainly a one-of-a-kind Boho Monroe creation. Recycled embellished additions, from stitched patches, orange lace, a curvy stitched trimming and even a clip-on earring, make this floral strapless spring dress into a unique conversation piece. 
*Hand washing recommended*
Size: M/L
Length: 34 in

name: "D" Bra Purse [001PR6]
description:
Do not purchase this purse if you don't want attention! Our super sexy bra purse features an elastic opening so you can carry any necessities without worry. Handmade and embellished to perfection, our D-sized bra purse is a one-of-a-kind Boho Monroe creation.

Purse opening measures 5 inches.

name: Monroe Cuff [001B11]
description: Our elegant Monroe cuff is worn like a collar on your wrist and features an additional green button and recycled curvy stitched trim. Wear this with comfort and style on your next night out. Length measures 8 3/8" and width measures 2".

name: Suspender Dress [100IC1]
description:
Our adorable  suspender dress will give your toddler a unique style at an early age. Featuring buttons, fringe and bows, this dress is sweet and simple for the spring and summer seasons. Add a turtle neck and leggings and your toddler can wear it right into the colder months.  
Hand washing is recommended. Size is 18 months and length measures 18".

name: Tie-Dye Tee [001SH2]
description:
Our V-neck tie-dyed tee is given bohemian style with hand-sewn crocheted lace detail and a studded feather detail. It's a comfortable,  one-of-a-kind tee perfect for a casual day out and about. 

Hand washing is recommended. This tee is a women's size S/M and measures 25.5 inches in length.

name: Studded Print Necklace [001N2]
description: This necklace, made from the neckline of a tank top, was designed and handmade to fit that chic, modern style. Studded trim around the print was actually taken from the straps of the tank and then added to structure the unique shape of the necklace.

name: Floral Tote [001PR3]
description:
Boho Monroe aims to create accessories that you will not find anywhere else. A large tank top was used to make this tote bag, perfect for everyday use and featuring a three dimensional floral doily for unique flair.

Bag opening measures 17 inches.

name: Woven Sling Bag [001PR7]
description:
This fun woven sling bag features bright colors and unique recycled floral embellishments. This one-of-a-kind Boho Monroe creation offers plenty of room for all of your essentials.

Bag opening measures 11 inches.

name: Snap Cuff [001B9]
description: Different from the majority of our bracelets, this one-of-a-kind piece is considered a wrap cuff that was made from an orange vintage female blouse. Snaps have been added for easy fastening as well as a bohemian neutral-toned floral printed trim. Length measures 7 3/4" and width measures 2 1/8".

name: Tie-Dye Necklace [001N1]
description: This necklace, like all Boho Monroe products, is a special one-of-a-kind piece, cut from the neckline of a tie dyed t-shirt and featuring a recycled floral patch, fringe and beaded elements -- all added by hand.

name: Floral Jacket [001J1]
description:
Recycled blue floral embellishments from a blouse give our fitted-brown blazer the extra flair needed to start a conversation when you walk into the office or hit the town for a fun night out. 

Hand washing is recommended. Jacket is a women's size medium; arm length is 25"and torso length is 22".

name: Flower Headband [001HB1]
description: This headband was created from a turtle neck sweater. It's perfect for winter and cool fall days or spring nights. Our signature Boho Monroe embellishment makes this headband a one-of-a-kind. Length measures 6.5" (please expect additional stretch).

name: "A" Bra Purse [001PR4]
description:
Be an individual and start the conversation with our A cup bra purse! Yes... you heard that right. It's a bra with a new purpose. Made from all recycled materials, buttons and ribbon were added for a feminine touch, and a button closure keeps your necessities contained. 

Purse opening measures 7 inches.

name: Bohemian Cuff [001B7]
description: This cuff that is made from a blue and green male button down shirt and has a recycled peasant, bohemian trim added to it giving you a unique accessory to add to your collection. Length measures 9 5/8" and width measures 2 3/16".

name: Flower Power Cuff [001B6]
description: Made from a blue and green printed male button down, this cuff is comfortable and works with all your seasonal styles. Added recycled floral embellishments make this bracelet on-of-a-kind. Length measures 9 5/8" and width measures 3 7/8".

name: Fringe Vest [001V1]
description:
Our fringed vest is a recycled Boho Monroe one-of-a-kind creation! Embellishments from shirts are hand sewn to add bohemian flair to an already stylish vest. Super comfortable and perfect to dress up or wear casual with your favorite basics. 

Hand washing is recommended. Vest is women's size S/M and measures 5.5 inches in length.

name: Tribal Cuff [001B5]
description: This tribal inspired cuff was cut from a male blue winter flannel giving your style warmth and a bohemian flair. Length measures 10" and width measures 2.5".

name: Floral Pillow [002PL1]
description: Our floral pillow is a one-of-a-kind piece of home décor featuring a  three dimensional doily pillow with a pop of color. This sweet and simple throw pillow will certainly give your furniture a Boho Monroe touch.

name: Floral Cuff [001B3]
description: Made from a female floral button down shirt, this chic bracelet will add elegance with petite, white flowers and green trim. Length measures 10.5" and width measures 2.5".

name: Simple Cuff [001B2]
description: This cuff is simplistic yet chic and colorful. It was cut from a male winter flannel and made into a unique Boho Monroe conversational piece. Length measures 9 ¾" and width measures 2.5".
